entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `nint` and `nuint` are suggested as keywords in an attribute list #70074
  • Handle the TODO in SarifV2Logger to detect when compiler fails with an exception #70069

Closed

  • `method` is not suggested as a keyword in the attribute list for local methods #70077
  • `delegate` is suggested as a keyword for attribute lists #70076
  • CSC task of single project taking much longer #70072
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34122.69 #70080
  • Reboot build chain codegen #19505
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround the deployment issue in Arcade #70090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issue where change namespace throws if there are duplicate Progra… #70089
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Override ChecksumSynchronizer.AddIfNeeded to not allocate an enumerator #70088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change AssemblyData.AvailableSymbols to ImmutableArray instead of IEnumerable #70087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add a struct enumerator for NodeStateTable<T> #70082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix official build check when publishing BCL in vsix #70081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add a struct enumerator for WeakList<T> #70075
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix order in which flow analysis visits `foreach` #70071
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Implement support in the LSIF generator for logging to stderr #70067
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge pull request #69917 from CyrusNajmabadi/sgOOP2" #70066
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move code to simpler type for interval trees #70085
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid iterator allocations when creating bloom filters #70083
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer 'delegate' inside an attribute #70086
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of elastic trivia when rewriting collections #70073
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • By default queue speedometer when insert Roslyn #70078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused member #70062
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add "Primary Constructors" to Compiler Test Plan.md #70050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix PullDiagnosticCategories to DiagnosticKind mapping in DocumentPullDiagnosticHandler #70068
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Deflect blame away from Roslyn.Utilities.Contract on failures #70064
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support 'wrapping' for collection expressions. #70060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #69917 from CyrusNajmabadi/sgOOP2" #70065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • 🧹 Declare MEF dependencies of VisualStudioWorkspace #54377
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid `null` type of pattern expression #70055
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged
  • Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70031
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, 17.8
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Initialize usage of ProjectDependencyGraph.Empty to start with a null reverseReferencesMap #70036
    Area-IDE, untriaged
